employers.role: Lead Front End Developer and Web Designer

Responsible for owning multiple customer-facing marketing sites and subdomains, coding pages based on designs/specs from team of designers, assist with technical feasibility of UI/UX in the design/readability of content across devices, and ensure sites are performing well and work as intended across all devices and browser types. Focusing on improving site performance (load times), optimizing all views for speed and scalability, improving the user experience, and improving conversion rates.
